it.polimi.se2018.view

Class VirtualView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable<ViewMessage>
      • it.polimi.se2018.view.View
        • it.polimi.se2018.view.VirtualView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<ModelUpdate>

    public class VirtualView
extends View
    This class represent a view on the server-side of the application.

    The aim of this class is to decouple the MVC architecture from the underlying networking services.

    This class is mutable and has no thread safety yet.

    Author:
    dvdmff

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirtualView(ClientNetInterface client)
      Creates a new virtual view with the specified player name that is associated with the given client.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VirtualView

        public VirtualView(ClientNetInterface client)
        Creates a new virtual view with the specified player name that is associated with the given client.
        Parameters:
        client - The client connection the player is using to communicate with the server.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if client is null.

    • Method Detail

      • setClient

        public void setClient(ClientNetInterface client)
        Sets a new client connection.

        This method must be called whenever the old connection is dead and a new one is established, otherwise the virtual view results disconnected.

        Parameters:
        client - The client connection the player is using to communicate with the server.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if client is null.
